titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Department of History, Honors Theses
Stanford University, Department of History, Honors Theses
titlestmt.author: Stanford University Archives staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives
publicationstmt.p: Copyright Â© 2015 The Board of Trustees of the Leland Stanford Junior University. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Department of History, honors theses
did.abstract: Honors theses by undergraduates in the Stanford University Department of History.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: The theses were received via administrative transfers from the Department of History, and from the Hume Writing Center in 2011. Additional theses were received from David M. Kennedy in 2012.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creators for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Department of History, Honors Theses (SC4-3960). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains honors theses by undergraduates in the Stanford University Department of History.
